Available Operations.Name: Basic Evaluation
Available Operations.Description: Evaluates a sample, given the problem description.

Results.Name: Evaluation
Results.Description: Contains a single number with the sample evaluation.

Available Operations.Name: Check Feasibility
Available Operations.Description: Determines whether a proposed sample is feasible, given the problem description.

Results.Name: Evaluation
Results.Description: Contains a boolean indicating whether the sample is feasible or not.
